message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I believe it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay $9,500 for it.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $9,750.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $9,500.
